TopicTitle: What is Gypsum, Karbonite, Hydrates ect.. In the resources menu??

Articles.Content:
One of the recent updates added resources, one which is ore which you can mine from planets, moons and asteroids. However, there seems to be a large amount of other resource types which I just cant seem to see a use for in game. The wiki states only about Ore in its resources page and no other natural element. 

 

All of this came to my attention when I was doing a resource scan on Moho and found other types of resources there, other than ore. 

 

Can someone please explain to me what these are. [My game is modded by the way, but no mods to my knowledge add these things to the game].
Do you have Karbonite installed, or any other resource mods?

Sounds like you have some mods installed? Though I didn't know any changed that list. 

Edited December 14, 2016 by 5thHorseman
You've almost certainly installed some mods from USI - essentially, better surface bases and life support.
I would say it's the Community Resource Pack that's to blame for this one.
This is most definitely an add-on discussion
Community resource pack,  usually with interstellar (which I highly recommend).
